pullrequest.title: Rotate force/torque with mouse on Apply Force/Torque dialog

content.raw: I was playing with the the force/torque dialog and Gazebo froze twice. It might be a deadlock. I spawned a Simple Arm and was playing with the interactive markers, changing the links and applying forces.
content.html: I was playing with the the force/torque dialog and Gazebo froze twice. It might be a deadlock. I spawned a Simple Arm and was playing with the interactive markers, changing the links and applying forces.
